verbs.description: [ARG2: army new camouflage uniforms] [V: hit] [ARG1: stores] [ARGM-TMP: july 1] the army begins its transition to new combat uniforms in a month the army said monday but soldiers can expect a lot of mixing and matching of camo items for the next several years the uniforms with the french army gray green army flame resistant army army army col robert mortlock army natick labs
